title: Traitor
description: I couldn't believe what I had done, what I had allowed Sean to do to me.He ripped me open, exposing me to the pain in my soul that I’ve hidden from for fourteen years. How can I ever forgive him for that?He should pay for what he’s done to me.He lives a life of callous violence.Turning him in is the right thing to do.But why does doing the right thing feel like the cruelest betrayal?Warning: This book contains strong language and scorching sex scenes involving BDSM.
author: Julia Sykes
